articles.title: Tiesj Benoot blames himself for crash that ruins Wout van Aert's Flanders dream - Global Cycling Network
articles.description: Visma-Lease a Bike left reeling after a self-inflicted crash ends Van Aert's spring Classics campaign and dampens the team's chances at a Monument win
articles.content:
The 2024 Dwars door Vlaanderen is a race that will bring Tiesj Benoot a wide mix of emotions.
On one hand, the Belgian helped his Visma-Lease a Bike teammate Matteo Jorgenson take his first one-day … [+1815 chars]
